meanings.definition: Of or relating to a suburb.
meanings.sent1: The suburban neighborhood had quiet streets and many trees.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the suburban lifestyle with its parks and friendly neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The suburban cat thought it was the mayor of the cul-de-sac.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a suburban maze of familiar houses and winding roads.
meanings.sent5: The suburban setting felt like a cozy blanket of familiarity.

meanings.definition: Residing in or characteristic of a suburb.
meanings.sent1: Their suburban house was painted a cheerful shade of yellow.
meanings.sent2: The family's suburban routine included weekend barbecues and walks in the park.
meanings.sent3: The suburban squirrel was a regular at the backyard bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts wandered through the suburban landscape of picket fences and minivans.
meanings.sent5: The suburban atmosphere was a comforting backdrop to their daily lives.
